name: Roboveda
description: An annual robotics competition bringing together top talent to showcase innovative robotic designs and automation technologies.

name: Sreevision
description: Sreevision is an inter-departmental tech fest that highlights the latest advancements in engineering and technology.

name: Ashwathama Sports Meet
description: Annual sports event featuring competitions in athletics, basketball, football, and more.

name: Sreeotsav
description: A cultural fest with vibrant performances, traditional dance competitions, music, and art exhibitions.

name: Hackathon 2024
description: 48-hour hackathon where students collaborate to build solutions to real-world problems.

name: Career Fair
description: Annual career fair connecting students with recruiters from leading companies.
